cards.title: Push
powers: You may discard a card or destroy an alteration. Draw up to 2 cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: 1 player may discard a card. If a card is discarded this way, one of that player's heroes may deal 1 target 2 projectile damage.

openingLines.default: The calvary has arrived! The- Wait, I mean cavalry! Argh! Anyway... just... stop doing bad stuff!
openingLines.TheDreamerCharacter: Oh, no, no, no. This is bad. Hey, little girl, did they teach you about earthquakes in school? Or tornados, or... I dunno. Can you find a sturdy place to hide?
openingLines.BaronBladeCharacter: I mean, cool concept... and fascinating implementation, but, like, have you thought this through at all?
openingLines.DeadlineCharacter: Oh, well, that's completely fine then! Carry on, as long as you feel bad about it! Do you even hear yourself?
openingLines.FrightTrainTeamCharacter: Hey, that's a cool tagline! Can you think of one for me? Something about moving stuff with waves or sound or something?
openingLines.InfinitorCharacter: Psychology's not really my thing- I mean, it's really cool, but I don't really study it... Anyway, that doesn't sound healthy!
openingLines.IronLegacyCharacter: Not what that means! I mean, justice is balance, but you just want to control everything. You're dispensing tyranny, right?
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Yeah, no. Not gonna happen. I was made for this!

cards.title: Bogged Down
body: When {Push} deals a target damage, reduce the next damage dealt by that target by 2.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.95]Sure, you didn't steal{BR}the purse. Mind telling me how you{BR}ended up -- let me see if I got this{BR}right -- literally buried in cleaning supplies?

cards.title: Collateral... Bonus?
body: When Push deals damage, destroy an environment card. If a card is destroyed this way, discard a card and the environment deals the same target 2 irreducible projectile damage.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: What? These don't even{BR}have people in them!

cards.title: Feedback Bounce
body: When {Push} deals damage, you may discard 2 cards. If 2 cards are discarded this way, destroy this card or put an ongoing from in play under this card. Otherwise put another hero's ongoing from in play under this card.
When this card is destroyed, {Push} deals X targets 4 projectile damage each, where X = the number of cards under this one.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Field Cascade
body: When {Push} would deal damage to a target, prevent that damage and destroy this card.
When this card is destroyed, for each target other than {Push}, discard 2 cards or {Push} deals that target X projectile damage, where X = the damage {Push} has prevented this turn.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Folding Forces
body: Increase projectile damage dealt by {Push} by 2.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: [y=0.85]{BR}“That's the thing people don't get. The waves want{BR}to sync up and, uh, harmonize. They want to fold{BR}back on themselves and be bigger. So. Much. Bigger.”{BR}[y=0.75] - Push, Apocalypse 10: The End of Time

cards.title: Force Pulse
body: Whenever an alteration card is in your hand, put it into play.
At the start of your turn, {Push} deals 1 target 5 projectile damage. Then destroy this card.

cards.title: Harmonic Junction
body: You may play an anchor. If you do, play all alterations in your hand.
Activate start of turn affects on all anchors, then destroy all alterations and anchors.

flavorQuotes.text: <You can act or not{BR}act. There are always consequences.{BR}Nobody's perfect. If you do act, don't{BR}hesitate -- Commit and accept{BR}whatever comes.>

cards.flavorText: <You can act or not{BR}act. There are always consequences.{BR}Nobody's perfect. If you do act, don't{BR}hesitate -- Commit and accept{BR}whatever comes.>

cards.title: Kinetic Absorption
body: When {Push} is dealt melee or projectile damage, draw a card.
powers: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put 1 revealed ongoing into your hand or into play. Discard the remaining cards. If an ongoing entered play this way, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey! Why don't we take this outside...{BR}and into a field far away from civilians?

cards.title: Newton's Cradle
body: The first time {Push} deals damage each turn, {Push} deals that same damage to 2 targets that have not been dealt damage this turn.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Look, it's all very scientific.{BR}I do a lot of studying. I do a lot of{BR}scientist-stuff. I'm, uh, a progeny or whatever. I'm basically science-girl.

cards.title: Objects in Motion
body: When you discard a card from your hand, put it under this card.
At the end of your turn, discard all cards under this card. {Push} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage for each card discarded this way.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.90]Stop wasting time.{BR}Just pull it to you.
[y=0.90]That's not a thing! The best I{BR}can do is try to throw it at myself!

cards.title: Path of Destruction
body: Whenever an alteration card is in your hand, put it into play.

At the start of your turn, {Push} deals 3 targets 3 irreducible projectile damage each. Then you may destroy a hero ongoing or equipment belonging to another player. If no card is destroyed this way, {Push} deals each target other than {Push} 0 projectile damage. Then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Because you don't care about anything! Teach me that!
This is my purpose. This is your{BR}purpose. There is nothing else.

cards.title: Phase Analyzer
body: The first time each turn that you draw a card, you may draw a second card or discard a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Yes, it connects to my tongue,{BR}no, it's not that weird! Lots of neurons,{BR}lets me see field vibrations! So I don't{BR}smash the building! Probably!

cards.title: Pivot Point
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until an anchor is revealed. Put it into your hand or into play. Discard the other revealed cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Okay, fine! I don't really know{BR}the science! I just hate people{BR}thinking I'm dumb because I'd rather{BR}live my life than study, okay?

cards.title: Rebound Pulse
body: When {Push} deals melee or projectile damage, draw a card.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: {BR}“You really want to see me cut{BR}loose, you blood-sucking freak?{BR}Ever hear the expression 'Be careful{BR}what you wish for?'”{BR}[y=0.90] - Push, Bastion City:{BR}A Spider Never Blinks #112

cards.title: Shockwave
body: Whenever an alteration card is in your hand, put it into play.
At the start of your turn, {Push} deals each non-hero target 2 projectile damage. Then destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: If you wouldn't mind, I think{BR}we could use a little space.

cards.title: Sympathetic Echo
body: Once per turn, when damage would be dealt to a target, you may discard a card to change the damage type to projectile or melee.
The first time each turn melee, projectile, or sonic damage is dealt to {Push} by any target, {Push} may deal the source of that damage 3 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: How can you be undefended?{BR}Each incoming vector crosses the wave{BR}your heartbeat emits. You know when{BR}it will be. Use it!

cards.title: Vector Math
body: Draw up to 2 cards.
Discard any number of cards.
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Guys, shut up! I've got to think!{BR}Of course I can do it, but how do I{BR}do it safely...ish?

cards.flavorReference: Push, Grim Tidings: Scared to Death

cards.title: Yeah, No
body: Destroy a target with 4 or fewer HP.
You may shuffle a non-character target destroyed this way into its deck. If you do, increase the next damage dealt to {Push} by X, where X = the destroyed target's current HP before it was destroyed.
